rooms.description: Open-plan living and kitchen area designed in an Art Deco style featuring bold geometric patterns, rich textures, and a streamlined appearance. This space is configured to support communal activities for the joint family.
Adjacent dining area with Vastu-aligned placements that promote positive energy flow, designed to complement the Art Deco theme with elegant detailing and budget-friendly materials.
A family room serving as a multi-purpose space for gatherings, entertainment, or quiet relaxation. Its layout adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring clear sightlines and a harmonious energy flow.

Service area including a small pantry, storage closet, and utility access points. The design prioritizes functionality on a tight budget with space-efficient solutions that align with Indian residential norms.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to welcome visitors in line with Vastu principles, featuring an Art Deco styled facade.
Large window openings ensuring ample natural light and ventilation as per local building codes.
